message.content:
cs.IOT, cs.SY, cs.HC, cs.NI, cs.SE 

The paper discusses the use of microlocation technologies in IoT-equipped smart buildings, which falls under the category of Internet of Things (cs.IOT) and systems and control (cs.SY). The paper also discusses the potential benefits for tenants, which falls under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). Finally, the paper discusses the challenges and potential solutions for integrating microlocation technologies with smart buildings, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE).
